fields.title: The Mentor – Mentee Program
fields.description: The existing program will be adjusted to begin during the stay of parents in the initial week of the academic semester to promote the interaction of mentors with parents .This would create a sense of responsibility in the mentors and push for a better mentor-mentee relationship.
fields.representativeComments: Counselling session with parents introduced. Individual counselling introduced in 3 hostels during the parental stay period.

fields.title: Improving Functionality Of Saathi Club
fields.description: Improve functioning by including a broad range of services such as psychological assessment, individual therapy and group therapy.

fields.title: Soft Skills workshop with Saathi Club
fields.description: Assist Saathi Club in organizing regular sessions by professionals for soft skills such as assertiveness, problem solving, anger management, self-awareness and relationships.
fields.representativeComments: Expect updates from the Welfare Board in mid-term break.

fields.title: Earthquake and Fire Drills
fields.description: Inclusion of earthquake and fire drills in the first few classes of SA courses for the freshmen.
fields.currentStatus: "Will coordinate with the new secy to get the drills done at the start of the next semester."

fields.title: Horticulture in Hostels
fields.description: Allowing for the growing of plants via a horticulture setup in hostels.

fields.title: Plantation Drives
fields.description: Organising Plantation Drives within the campus.
fields.representativeComments: Done one in odd semester. Even semester drive planned on April 14/15.

fields.title: Zero Illiteracy zone (ZIZ)
fields.description: Would work with NSS and continue this good work and expand its reach further.

fields.title: Spread Awareness About Seasonal Diseases
fields.description: Expand the domain of the club to spread awareness on seasonal diseases through social media, mails and campaigns.

fields.title: Spread Awareness About HIV and Other Chronic Diseases
fields.description: Spread awareness about various chronic diseases along with HIV for students to know and take necessary precautions.

fields.title: Sessions for Preparation of Competitive Examinations
fields.description: Conduct talks for giving updates and new scenarios in the preparation of Civils (UPSC) and other competitive examinations.
fields.currentStatus: "The social media groups are functioning very well at the moment."

fields.title: Fitness Awareness Debates
fields.description: Conduct debates on general fitness awareness for students’ well-being.
fields.representativeComments: One done under the YES! Camp. Another coming up in April first week.

fields.title: HSS projects through Project Management Portal
fields.description: With the help of project management portal, students would now be eligible for taking up projects from the department of HSS. This would nourish the thinking of a student.

fields.title: Talks About Women Safety
fields.description: Organize a talk in girls’ hostels regarding women safety and harassment laws and focus on facilities provided by the Internal Complaint Committee.

fields.title: AAP KI SABHA
fields.description: Senate would take up important agendas that concern a lot of students and put them in front of the concerned authorities and have a good open debate. These discussions would be taken up till SAC meeting.
fields.currentStatus: One Sabha was called for Academic Curriculum change.

fields.title: Alumni-Intern Portal
fields.description: A platform where alumni can recruit interns for their projects. A student can register and upload his CV and if one’s candidature is strong, they would be taken up for further projects by our Alumni.
fields.representativeComments: Django mismatch with CC leading to delays. Proposal underway for new cloud servers from the next financial year.

fields.title: GATE/GRE/UPSC/CAT Blog
fields.description: This blog will help create opportunities for group discussions and sharing of resource material.

fields.title: Public Discussions
fields.description: Collaborate with CCD in order to conduct regular aptitude tests and training sessions on coding skills, group discussions and personal interviews. Host departmental and hostel level meets to pass on information about the placement and intern season to the next batch.
fields.currentStatus: "CCD took in only suggestions. Couldn’t prepare a shared plan with them."

fields.title: PG Specific Orientation
fields.description: A PG specific orientation can help the incoming batch a lot as it can touch on PG centric topics such as foreign exchange program and also about the facilities they can utilize in the campus.

fields.title: International Student Representative for Welfare Board
fields.description: Would appoint a nominee and a team under him/her for the welfare of international students residing in the campus. This would include many activities such as international day, a presentation for letting them know about their rights and the responsibilities that they have and can take up.

fields.title: “Hand me down” initiative
fields.description: An online platform will be set up where the students can donate their belongings for the benefit of freshmen.
fields.representativeComments: Executed in the previous tenure and plan in place for conduction in the next semester.

fields.title: Faculty student Interaction
fields.description: Organizing few events like Intra-Departmental sports events in all departments to improve the interaction between faculty and the students.

fields.title: Student Handbook
fields.description: A freshmen guide containing the following but not limited to Important Facilities, Important Telephone Numbers ,Important Authorities to be contacted, Academic Requirements , Attendance Requirements , Student Activities , Institute Library Hostel Rules , Alumni sponsored Scholarships/ Loan Scholarships, Medical Insurance ,Academic Calendar, Semester Time Table ,Internal Complaints Committee , Services and Facilities In and Around IITG, Mentor- Mentee Program, IIT Wi-Fi Set-up , IIT Guwahati Proxy setting for Hostel LAN.

fields.title: Anti-Ragging
fields.description: Reinforce strong rules for avoiding unwanted acts. Any interaction between fresher’s and seniors where the seniors are friendly, welcoming and non-aggressive is encouraged. Seniors may solicit participation in clubs and other activities by announcing promotional events at well designated times and places. However, no fresher should be forced to attend. Participation by fresher’s can only be voluntary.

fields.title: G-SEC meter
fields.description: A new initiative taken by the SWC body this year to make every candidate responsible and accountable. There would be a few additions such as a discussion forum wherein a student can propose a point that is causing him some sort of difficulty and if it is feasible this would be taken up by the student senate and the website would live track the updates regarding that agenda.An interactive discussion forum wherein a student can propose any idea and the best feasible one would be implemented right away.

fields.title: Emergency helpline number for women
fields.description: Considering the security or emergency condition this initiative would be set up at the hostel desk for immediate contact.

fields.title: Green Cycle Initiative Follow Up and Scale Up
fields.description: Follow up and scaling up of green cycle initiative with the help of SAIL and Student Senate.

fields.title: Scholarship Information Repository
fields.description: An online repository of the various scholarships that are floated throughout the year and spread awareness about them for the benefit of the student community.

fields.title: Dynamic Conference Calender
fields.description: Initiate a Dynamic Conference Calendar at the start of the semester in order to keep track of all the conferences to be conducted throughout the semester.
fields.representativeComments: The number of people responsible for events creates this a logistical nightmare.

fields.title: Travel Grant Funds Increment
fields.description: Collaborate with SAIL and Academic section to increase the corpus fund to facilitate more number of students(both UG &PG) travel grants in order to enhance the research community in the campus

fields.title: Collaboration with Other Hospitals To Improve the Overall Medical Facility
fields.description: To tie up with other hospitals within the city with a memorandum of understanding to refer the students for better medical facilities and this will be covered under their medical insurance.
fields.representativeComments: Can’t tinker with the current insurer’s network.

fields.title: Disposal Of Bio-Waste
fields.description: Ensuring the proper disposal of bio-medical waste.

fields.title: Digitalizing the Hospital- Appointment
fields.description: The online portal as of now is ready for containing the medical records of the Students and also lets the students to make appointments with the concerned doctors. As of now, there is no proper infrastructure to launch and maintain the portal. This would be tackled by taking up appropriate measures.

fields.title: Feedback System For Hospital
fields.description: Proposing the development of an online feedback system for the IIT Guwahati Hospital.
fields.representativeComments: Absence of proper follow up is dragging it behind schedule.

fields.title: Online Medical Records
fields.description: Maintaining and updating of medical records online.
